external_games.name: Legend of the Time Sword: Episode 1

name: Legend of the Time Sword: Episode 1
summary: You awaken in a strange place. A giant floating head has brought you here and commands you to get a legendary "blade thingy". As soon as you touch the sword you realize that you are able to travel back in time to help your past self to solve the strange puzzles lying ahead in a watery dungeon.
